title: Bug 124066 in context menu, insert chart is not translated into Chinese
description: Bug 124066 in context menu, insert chart is not translated into Chinese
OB: When right-clicking in the layout to bring up the context menu, the option 'Insert Chart' is not translated into Chinese.
EB: Expected behavior: The option 'Insert Chart' should be translated into Chinese.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the layout where you can right-click.
3. Right-click to bring up the context menu.
4. Observe that the option 'Insert Chart' is not translated into Chinese.
